name: All20sDiceRoller
description:
Hello, this is Plexagon, the creater of this dice roller simulation. I don't really have much to say about it other than to check out this devlog if you are interested: 

FEATURES:

  • 2 Different Rolling Scenes, the traditional cup and also bread.
  • Sounds and Graphics taken directly from All20s videos
  • Dice Rolling actually works realistically
  • Can be played in browser or be downloaded for windows.

For better sound quality, download the windows application instead of playing in browser. Everything else should be the same.
